morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happened‚ probably in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.caseExplained: something is being done for them or relating to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.caseDescription: that something is done for‚ or in relation to
morphInfos.description: give them to women that _have done themselves_ good
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was done to or for female people or things that something is done for‚ or in relation to
